document_data.name: Patchouli
document_data.mainbody: '''Patchouli''' was a species of aromatic flowering plant found in the jungles of the [[Malatran Plateau]] and several other regions.
document_data.Availability:
* [[Death Becomes Her Beauty]], a shop in the town of [[Spiderhaven]] in [[Undermountain]] that sold suspiciously sourced scented [[soap]]s, including soaps made with patchouli flowers.
* Patchouli was among goods transported across the [[Hordelands]].
* The [[Simbara]] people of the [[Valley of the Lion]] on the Malatran Plateau gathered such aromatic plants as [[rose]], [[vanilla]], and patchouli to be used in creating of soaps and oils. These substances were used in the tribal bathhouses and in ceremonial religious cleansing before standing in front of the Simbara deityâ€”[[Vizerathu]], the spirit of the Lion.
document_data.Usages: Dried patchouli was sold as an aromatic substance by the ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''. It was listed in the Priest's Alcove section of the catalogue and was sold at two ounces for a single [[silver]] [[coin]]. The same catalogue offered exotic scented [[oil]]s, including patchouli lamp oil, and scented patchouli [[beeswax]].
